tool_description: Contacts and validates vendor references, collecting performance feedback and verifying past contract execution capabilities.

validation_criteria.description: Specific criteria to validate with references

error_messages: Registration not found: The provided registration_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid email format: One or more reference contact emails are not valid.
Insufficient references: At least 2 reference contacts are required.
Reference contact failed: Unable to reach one or more reference contacts.
Incomplete reference data: References provided insufficient information for validation.
usage: Provide registration_id and reference_contacts array. Optionally specify validation_criteria for targeted reference checking. The tool contacts references and compiles feedback.

concerns_raised.description: Concerns or negative feedback from references
